name: ethglobal-web3
description: ETHGlobal Web3 Hackathon - NFT Import project

scripts.sub-build: cd thegraph && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.sub-check: npx prettier-eslint thegraph/**/*js thegraph/**/*.ts thegraph/**/*.json thegraph/**/*.yaml thegraph/**/*.graphql thegraph/**/*.md --write
scripts.sub-deploy: cd thegraph && graph deploy zapaz/eip721-mumbai --debug  --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
